parameters.query: SELECT * FROM auto_defense_rules WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY priority ASC

options.customEmailConfig: ={{ JSON.stringify({ host: $env.IMAP_HOST || 'imap.gmail.com', port: 993, user: $env.IMAP_USER, password: $env.IMAP_PASSWORD, tls: true }) }}

parameters.query: INSERT INTO imap_monitoring_logs (email_uid, email_from, email_subject, alert_type, detected_keywords, video_id, action_taken) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5::text[], $6, 'processing') RETURNING id

parameters.query: UPDATE imap_monitoring_logs SET action_taken = $2, appeal_draft = $3, appeal_status = 'draft', notified_at = NOW() WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM imap_monitoring_logs WHERE video_id = $1 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)

parameters.name: body

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ success: true, alert_detected: false, message: $json.message }) }}
